name: Hentai Polka
description:
Relax to a simple puzzle game, and unlock sexy images.
Order the squares to complete the image, and then hear the character get excited.

  • All art commisioned by artists
  • Relaxing music to keep you in a good mood
  • 50+ Achievements, and hidden achievements
  • Sexy sound effects

Art Credits:
  • Cyota
  • Hakuya
  • Rato
